Twitter @Binance https://twitter.com/binance The world’s leading blockchain ecosystem and digital asset exchange. #Binance #BNB For support: @BinanceHelpDesk - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1675157106213761024/ZdGEaW1k.jpgTwitter @Binance https://twitter.com/binance 2023 年 7 月 14 日星期五 08:59:40 GMT 120 At #Binance, users come first. With Binance leaving the Dutch market, we want to make the transition as smooth as possible. We are pleased to announce...At #Binance, users come first.

随着币安退出荷兰市场，我们希望尽可能顺利地进行过渡。

我们很高兴地宣布，我们的荷兰用户只需点击几下即可将资金转移到@Coinmerce。
